<section class="featuresContainer_bzYo" id="features"><div class="container"><h2 class="sectionTitle_IiTd">⚡️Powerful features, <span class="gradient-text">minimal API 🪶</span></h2><div class="featuresGrid_qndx"><a class="featureCard_dezI" href="/jods/intro"><div class="featureHeader_jDGq"><div class="featureIcon_dqhS">☁️</div><h3>Zero Dependencies</h3></div><p class="featureDescription_R8cs">No bloat, no overhead, just pure performance with a tiny footprint.</p></a><a class="featureCard_dezI" href="/jods/api-reference#-computedfn"><div class="featureHeader_jDGq"><div class="featureIcon_dqhS">🧠</div><h3>Computed Values</h3></div><p class="featureDescription_R8cs">Create reactive derived state that updates automatically when dependencies change.</p></a><a class="featureCard_dezI" href="/jods/remix"><div class="featureHeader_jDGq"><div class="featureIcon_dqhS">⚡</div><h3>Framework Integration</h3></div><p class="featureDescription_R8cs">First-class support for React, Preact, and Remix with dedicated hooks and adapters.</p></a><a class="featureCard_dezI" href="/jods/api-reference#-jsonstore"><div class="featureHeader_jDGq"><div class="featureIcon_dqhS">🪞</div><h3>JSON Snapshots</h3></div><p class="featureDescription_R8cs">Get serializable state snapshots on demand with json() - perfect for APIs and persistence.</p></a><a class="featureCard_dezI" href="/jods/intro"><div class="featureHeader_jDGq"><div class="featureIcon_dqhS">🧬</div><h3>Simple Mental Model</h3></div><p class="featureDescription_R8cs">Just use objects directly - no actions, reducers, or boilerplate to manage your state.</p></a><a class="featureCard_dezI" href="/jods/dynamics-system"><div class="featureHeader_jDGq"><div class="featureIcon_dqhS">🔄</div><h3>Fine-grained Reactivity</h3></div><p class="featureDescription_R8cs">Signal-based tracking for optimal performance, updating only what changed.</p></a></div></div></section>
